tweet_text:
@dlindsay80_pb @yyzsportsmedia it’s a little tricky because SN & TSN split radio + TV rights. Sometimes SN has TV but not radio and vice versa. So it would be impossible to go simulcast on radio, since they don’t own the TV audio feed for every game.
 
Things are different with the Jays since they control both
